name: filter_bbox
description: Drops observations from a collection that are located outside of a given bounding box.

extent.description: Spatial extent, may include a vertical axis (height or depth).

crs.description:
Coordinate reference system. EPSG codes must be supported. In addition, proj4 strings should be supported by back-ends. Whenever possible, it is recommended to use EPSG codes instead of proj4 strings.
Defaults to `EPSG:4326` unless the client explicitly requests a different coordinate reference system.

base.description: Base (optional, lower left corner, coordinate axis 3).

height.description: Height (optional, upper right corner, coordinate axis 3).
